mapper.select: select * from accom_book where user_id=#{user_id} and payment_condition='결제취소' order by accom_book_number desc
mapper.update: update accom_book set accom_enddate=null,payment_condition='결제취소',total_price= case when accom_startdate=sysdate then total_price when accom_startdate<=sysdate+1 then total_price*0.7 when accom_startdate<=sysdate+2 then total_price*0.5 when accom_startdate<=sysdate+3 then total_price*0.3 when accom_startdate<=sysdate+4 then total_price*0.2 when accom_startdate<=sysdate+5 then total_price*0.1 else 0 end ,accom_startdate=null where accom_book_number=#{accom_book_number}
mapper.select: select * from tour_book where user_id=#{user_id} and payment_condition='결제취소' order by tour_book_number desc
